About the Company: Eskay Knit (India) Ltd is engaged in spinning, knitting and processing activities.The company has also launched retail and hyper markets for multiple products and will open retail stores all over India with brands like League and Assets. The company has also ventured into introducing software products in the areas of e-commerce with logistic support, mobile communication and wireless application protocol, knitwear and fashion portals, software for internet applications and web enabling, insurance and banking, and CAD/CAM.They also plan to export garments to major supply chains such as Wal-Mart and Urgent Gear.
